price: Arababwira ati “Yemwe bantu banjye! Nta bucucu mfite, ahubwo ndi Intumwa yoherejwe na Nyagasani w’ibiremwa byose.”
arabic: قَالَ يَٰقَوۡمِ لَيۡسَ بِي سَفَاهَةٞ وَلَٰكِنِّي رَسُولٞ مِّن رَّبِّ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: qāla yāqawmi laysa bī safāhatun walākinnī rasūlun min rabbi al-ʿālamīna
